main event: A black oblong object resembling a football with four lights was observed moving with high speed over Keesler AFB in Mississippi on April 6, 1965.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be an aircraft, but the FAA had no records of any flight in the area at the time., The object descended to about 1000 feet and then ascended to around 2000 feet., The lights were of high intensity and still, unlike typical aircraft lights., The object's size was estimated to be 15-20 feet in diameter, similar to the size of the moon., The sighting lasted for approximately 15 seconds before the object disappeared.
sighted object: a black oblong object with four lights
witness description: a military observer who noted the object's unusual appearance and lack of sound
